all_functions module¶

all_functions.find_exceptions(num_list)¶

fxn checks and raises appropriate exceptions: type, value and import

Parameters:

num_list – list of integers
Raises:
  • TypeError – checks to make sure list is integers
  • ImportError – checks to make sure correct files are imported
  • ValueError – makes sure the integers have real values
all_functions.find_min_max(num_list)¶

Function takes list of integers and returns min and max in a tuple

Parameters:num_list – list of integers
Returns max_min:
 a tuple containing the max and min of a list
all_functions.main(num_list)¶
all_functions.maxdiff(num_list)¶

Function takes a list of integers and returns the maximum difference between two adjacent numbers

Parameters:num_list – list of integers
Returns maxdiff:
 maximum difference
all_functions.sum_list(num_list)¶

Function takes list of integers and returns the sum of the list

Parameters:num_list – list of integers
Returns sumsum_:
 the sum of the list of integers
